dcterms:creator: Federal Highway Administration
dcterms:description: The NGSIM projectâ€™s I-80 dataset contains trajectory data for vehicles in a highway merge scenario for three 15-minute timespans. These are tracked using a fixed camera system. The dataset includes position, velocity, and acceleration data, which are smoothed to remove unrealistic values.
dcterms:title: NGSIM I-80 dataset

dcterms:creator: R. Krajewski
J. Bock
L. Kloeker
L. Eckstein
dcterms:description: The HighD dataset is a series of drone recordings that provide naturalistic vehicle trajectories on German highways. It contains about 16.5 hours of data, featuring 110,000 vehicles over a total driving distance of 45,000 km, primarily on roads without on- or off-ramps.
dcterms:title: HighD dataset
